author: Special Correspondent
title: COVID-19 spread: Doctor recommends switching from contact lenses to glasses
description: In the wake of the rapid spread of COVID-19, ophthalmologist K. Bhujang Shetty has advised those wearing contact lenses to switch to eyeglasses as a preventive measure.“Not many know that the virus ca
content:
In the wake of the rapid spread of COVID-19, ophthalmologist K. Bhujang Shetty has advised those wearing contact lenses to switch to eyeglasses as a preventive measure.
Not many know that the virus can also enter the body through the eyes when people touch t… [+649 chars]
